India: Treaty of Purandar (1665) (or पुरंदर चा तह) was signed on 11 June 1665, between Shivaji and the Rajput ruler Jai Singh I.
Russia: Lubomirski's Rokosz: A Polish nobleman launched a rokosz (rebellion) against the king. The pro-Turkish Cossack noble Petro Doroshenko defeated his pro-Russian adversaries in the Right-bank Ukraine.
Spain: Philip IV died. The Spanish Empire had reached approximately 12.2 million square kilometers (4.7 million square miles) in area
Taiwan: Shi Lang attempts to invade Taiwan but his fleet is scattered by a storm
